document_data.name: Calliope
document_data.mainbody: '''Calliope''' was a [[cheetah]] that was a part of the [[Jack Mooney & Sons Circus]] of [[Ravens Bluff]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Calliope was a fast and nimble {{SI|4'|'"|long=yes}} long feline. Like other cheetahs, Calliope had unmatched speed and dangerous rending claws on all for appendages. She was a trained circus animal.
document_data.History: In the mid-14{{th}} century DR, Calliope could often be found in the company of her master and the circus owner [[Jack Mooney]], a [[ranger]] of fine skill. Alongside his other cats, [[Raynock]] the [[tiger]], and [[Stray]] the [[leopard]], Calliope served as ranger's [[animal companion]] and defender.
